matview_sql: ' ', (SELECT string_agg(tn.description, ' ') FROM transaction_normalized AS tn WHERE tn.award_id = awards.id GROUP BY tn.award_id)
to_tsvector(COALESCE((SELECT legal_business_name FROM duns WHERE awardee_or_recipient_uniqu = COALESCE(x.duns, transaction_fabs.awardee_or_recipient_uniqu)), '')) AS recipient_name_ts_vector,
) x ON latest_transaction.id = x.transaction_id AND latest_transaction.is_fpds = true
(awards.category IS NOT NULL OR contract_data.pulled_from = 'IDV') AND
